attributes.name: TokenVesting

attributes.documentation: @return the beneficiary of the tokens.

attributes.documentation: @return the cliff time of the token vesting.

attributes.documentation: @return the start time of the token vesting.
attributes.name: start

attributes.documentation: @return the duration of the token vesting.
attributes.name: duration

attributes.documentation: @return true if the vesting is revocable.
attributes.name: revocable

attributes.documentation: @return the amount of the token released.
attributes.name: released

attributes.documentation: @return true if the token is revoked.
attributes.name: revoked

attributes.documentation:
@notice Transfers vested tokens to beneficiary.
@param token ERC20 token which is being vested
attributes.name: release
revoke

@dev Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

attributes.documentation:

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@return the address of the owner.
attributes.name: owner

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
